title: Is religion good or bad? (This is a trick question)
description: Plenty of good things are done in the name of religion, and plenty of bad things too. But what is religion, exactly — is it good or bad, in and of itself? Philosopher Kwame Anthony Appiah offers a generous, surprising view.
author: Kwame Anthony Appiah
keywords: TED, talks, atheism, faith, global issues, philosophy, religion
